english: We may skip the honors from congress .
chinese: 我们可以免去国会的致哀。

english: Allende showed his disdain for the congressional action .
chinese: 阿连德根本不把国会的决议放在眼里。

english: But the public and congressional temper was decidedly different .
chinese: 但是公众和国会的情绪是绝然不同的。

english: It was one of the most pretentious pieces of legislation ever presented to congress to that time。
chinese: 这是直到当时提交国会的最费力的法案之一。

english: I wonder you did that when you know the act of parliament against wearing the highland dress .
chinese: 你不知道你怎么这样做的，你不是知道国会的法令，禁止穿高地服装吗？
国会的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: One of the major characteristics of the congress is the dominant role committees play in its proceedings .
chinese: 国会的重大特征之一，是由各委员会在国会工作过程中担当主要的角色。

english: In fact, sentiment in congress was so vociferous that administration leaders suppressed it only with difficulty .
chinese: 实际上，国会的情绪是如此激动，政府领导人好不容易才压下去。

english: The department most in accord with media and congressional criticism became, unintentionally, its focus .
chinese: 同新闻界和国会的批评意志最一致的这个部门无意中却成了这种批评的焦点。

english: The rascals! now that i represent my borough and may sit for the country, they begin to recollect me !
chinese: 这些坏东西！他们看我做了区里的代表，或许还能做国会的议员，就想起我来了。

english: With the questions in parliament. all the old names were thrown upvassall, the protland affair, philby .
chinese: 国会的指责把老问题全都兜露出来了瓦塞尔呀，波特兰事件呀，菲尔比呀。

english: A special message to congress on january 31, 1908, sounded the keynote of a campaign for advanced national legislation .
chinese: 1908年1月31日他给国会的特别咨文，赋有争先进的全国立法运动的基调。

english: An act of parliament might be obtained, declaring him legitimate, and allowing him the name and arms of his father .
chinese: 可以搞到国会的一项法令，宣布他为合法婚姻所生，准许他采用父亲的名字和徽号。

english: Compared with dealing with the banks, the congressional hearings were as easy as changing a flat tire on a spring day .
chinese: 拿同银行打交道来比较，那国会的听证会简直就象在一个美好的春日换个瘪气轮胎那么容易。

english: There are many things the president can do only with the cooperation of congress and approval of the supreme court; there are many things he cannot do at all .
chinese: 有许多事总统只有在得到国会的合作与最高法院的准许之下才能进行，也有许多事情他根本无法着手。

english: They pledged him the full support of congress
chinese: 他们保证他将得到国会的全力支持。
